title: Issues logging in using comcast in certain areas
body: I was made aware that there might be issues with people trying to login with comcast in the states of indiana or illinois.  Is anyone from those states having issues logging in with Comcast?  Will this issue be Addressed???

replies.body: Unfortunately, there's not much we at Riot can do if Comcast is currently having issues on their end. The best I can suggest would be to do a trace route to our servers using something like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and using that data to back up your claims if you reach out to Comcast.
